metadata.title: CVE-2019-14973 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: _TIFFCheckMalloc and _TIFFCheckRealloc in tif_aux.c in LibTIFF through 4.0.10 mishandle Integer Overflow checks because they rely on compiler behavior that is undefined by the applicable C standards. This can, for example, lead to an application crash.

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.10+git191003-1').
